siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Youtube 上的全球热门视频

blogPost.excerpt:
*** GET YOUR HANDS ON YOUR VERY OWN BOX OF JAMS AT SandersJam.com!!! (Crofter's is unfortunately only able to ship to the US and Canada) ***

FLASH WARNING - 3:55 (click here for an alternate version: https://youtu.be/FXBdz0wl4k8 )

Marketing can be a big ‘ole mix and mess of different ideas and tactics, and the Sides have VERY different approaches and tastes when it comes to the art of commercials. So how do they hash this problem out? They make their own, of course! Who knows what these ideas might lead to?

(I appreciate being let known that “infodump” is a trait associated with people with ADHD and autism and I am so sorry for the offense I’ve caused for its inclusion in the latest video. The context of that moment, among other moments between Roman and Logan in the series, was the paralleling of myself sometimes being critical of myself for doing the exact same thing in real life. I’m pretty renown for over-explaining and, even when my friends say it’s okay, I still find myself apologizing for it. However, I had no idea the term was offensive to some, which is something I needed to learn. For whatever it’s worth, I love that trait in regards to Logan, and we were narratively depicting Roman to be in the wrong for saying it. Also, Logan is on a track to get vindication for this in the future. I will be sure to triple check any terminology used in the future. Again, I’m incredibly sorry.)

BIG THANK YOU to our Patrons, who are already making projects such as this much more possible with their support! 

If YOU would like to lend your support and become a Patron, you can do so by heading on over to Patreon.com/ThomasSanders !

Everyone was properly Covid-tested and masked up when they weren't in front of the camera for this shoot! Made sure to keep the team very small through this whole process!
 
I’d like to give a BIG thank you to AJ and Davi, for not only helping to write the script but for also helping out as crew members during the filming of this video! 

AJ's Links:
https://www.instagram.com/aj.hentges

Davi’s Links:
https://www.instagram.com/hello_davii​
https://www.twitter.com/hello_davi​
https://vm.tiktok.com/ZMJAwTT8X/

Also a HUGE thank you and shoutout goes to our wonderful producer Quil for joining the filming crew, as well as helping out with props!

Quil’s Links:
https://www.instagram.com/quildarling​
https://www.twitter.com/quildarling​
https://vm.tiktok.com/ZMJPjMe4W/

A HUGE thank you goes to Ed Templer at Mandy Celine for helping put together the edit of the commercial segments of this video!

Ed’s Links:
https://mandyceline.com
https://twitch.tv/gamehoggames

I’d also like to give a GARGANTUAN thank you to James, for once again coming on as our videographer! He blew us away as always!!!

James' Links:
https://www.youtube.com/c/jlite​
https://www.instagram.com/jameslightner

Thank you so much to Brei for all the animated effects and special graphics in this video!!!

Brei’s Links:
https://www.twitter.com/breigrace​
https://www.instagram.com/brei.grace​
https://breigrace.wixsite.com/portfolio

A BIG OL’ THANK YOU to Danilo for creating the lovely thumbnail!

Danilo’s Links:
https://www.youtube.com/CometBrace/

Last but certainly not least, I’d like to give a great big thank you to Aleksandr and Sterling for coming out and appearing in the video as our skateboarders, as well as Kenny for being our Patton double!!!

Aleksandr’s Links:
https://www.twitter.com/aswilde1
https://www.instagram.com/wildfirecontent

Kenny's Links:
https://www.youtube.com/user/KAJAproduction
https://www.twitter.com/kennyguygames
http://www.Instagram.com/thatkennyguy1 
http://www.twitch.tv/thatkennyguygames

Sterling’s Links:
https://www.instagram.com/sterling_shaped_sterling

_______________________

My Social Links: 
http://www.Twitter.com/ThomasSanders​
http://www.Instagram.com/ThomasSanders​
http://www.Facebook.com/ThomasSandersOfficial
TikTok - https://vm.tiktok.com/ZMeN9NfyF/
Snapchat - Thomas_Sanders
Tumblr - https://thatsthat24.tumblr.com/​
http://www.vine.co/ThomasSanders​
________________________

Merchandise: 
North America/WorldWide: https://shop.thomassanders.com/​
________________________
Business Inquires: business@fosterdawg.com
________________________

Works Cited:

https://croftersorganic.com/support/faq/

Marketing can be a big ‘ole mix and mess of different ideas and tactics, and the Sides have VERY different approaches and tastes when it comes to the art of commercials. So how do they hash this problem out? They make their own, of course! Who knows what these ideas might lead to?

localize.title: 果酱的回归 | 托马斯-桑德斯
localize.description:
***在SandersJam.com拿到你自己的一盒JAMS！！！（Crofter's很不幸的是，只有在美国和加拿大才能发货。(不幸的是，Crofter's只能运送到美国和加拿大) *****

闪光警告 - 3:55 (点击这里查看备用版本：https://youtu.be/FXBdz0wl4k8 )

营销可以是一个大的'OLE混合和混乱的不同的想法和策略，和双方有非常不同的方法和口味，当它涉及到的广告艺术。那么他们是如何解决这个问题的呢？当然是他们自己做! 谁知道这些想法会导致什么呢？

(我很感激被告知 "infodump "是一种与多动症和自闭症患者相关的特征，我对我在最新视频中加入它所引起的冒犯感到非常抱歉。那一刻的背景，以及系列中罗曼和罗根之间的其他时刻，是我自己有时因为在现实生活中做了完全相同的事情而对自己进行批评的比喻。我是相当有名的过度解释，即使我的朋友说没关系，我仍然发现自己为此道歉。然而，我不知道这个词对某些人来说是冒犯的，这是我需要学习的东西。不管怎么说，我喜欢罗根的这种特质，我们在叙事上描写罗曼说这句话是错误的。而且，罗根在未来也会因此得到平反。今后，我一定会对任何术语进行三查。再次，我非常抱歉）。)

衷心感谢我们的赞助人，他们的支持已经让这样的项目变得更加可能了 

如果您想给予支持并成为我们的赞助人，您可以前往Patreon.com/ThomasSanders网站进行支持。

每个人都经过了适当的Covid测试，当他们不在镜头前时，他们都戴上了面具。在整个拍摄过程中，确保团队规模非常小!
 
我想在此向AJ和Davi表示感谢，他们不仅帮助编写了剧本，还在拍摄过程中作为工作人员提供了帮助。

AJ的链接。
https://www.instagram.com/aj.hentges

戴维的链接。
https://www.instagram.com/hello_davii
https://www.twitter.com/hello_davi
https://vm.tiktok.com/ZMJAwTT8X/

此外，还要感谢我们出色的制片人Quil加入拍摄团队，并帮助制作道具。

Quil的链接。
https://www.instagram.com/quildarling
https://www.twitter.com/quildarling
https://vm.tiktok.com/ZMJPjMe4W/

衷心感谢Mandy Celine的Ed Templer，感谢他帮助编辑了这段视频的广告片。

Ed的链接。
https://mandyceline.com
https://twitch.tv/gamehoggames

我也要感谢James，再次担任我们的摄像师。他一如既往地给我们留下了深刻的印象！!

詹姆斯的链接。
https://www.youtube.com/c/jlite
https://www.instagram.com/jameslightner

非常感谢Brei在这段视频中提供的所有动画效果和特殊图形！!

Brei的链接。
https://www.twitter.com/breigrace
https://www.instagram.com/brei.grace
https://breigrace.wixsite.com/portfolio

非常感谢Danilo的可爱缩略图。

Danilo的链接。
https://www.youtube.com/CometBrace/

最后，我想非常感谢Aleksandr和Sterling作为我们的滑板手出现在视频中，以及Kenny作为我们的Patton替身！！！！！！。

Aleksandr的链接。
https://www.twitter.com/aswilde1
https://www.instagram.com/wildfirecontent

肯尼的链接。
https://www.youtube.com/user/KAJAproduction
https://www.twitter.com/kennyguygames
http://www.Instagram.com/thatkennyguy1 
http://www.twitch.tv/thatkennyguygames

斯特林的链接。
https://www.instagram.com/sterling_shaped_sterling

_______________________

我的社会链接。
http://www.Twitter.com/ThomasSanders
http://www.Instagram.com/ThomasSanders
http://www.Facebook.com/ThomasSandersOfficial
TikTok - https://vm.tiktok.com/ZMeN9NfyF/
Snapchat - Thomas_Sanders
Tumblr - https://thatsthat24.tumblr.com/
http://www.vine.co/ThomasSanders
________________________

商品。
北美/全球：https://shop.thomassanders.com/
________________________
业务咨询：business@fosterdawg.com

localize.title: 果醬的迴歸 | 托馬斯-桑德斯
localize.description:
***在SandersJam.com拿到你自己的一盒JAMS！！！（Crofter's很不幸的是，只有在美國和加拿大才能發貨。(不幸的是，Crofter's只能運送到美國和加拿大) *****

閃光警告 - 3:55 (點擊這裏查看備用版本：https://youtu.be/FXBdz0wl4k8 )

營銷可以是一個大的'OLE混合和混亂的不同的想法和策略，和雙方有非常不同的方法和口味，當它涉及到的廣告藝術。那麼他們是如何解決這個問題的呢？當然是他們自己做! 誰知道這些想法會導致什麼呢？

(我很感激被告知 "infodump "是一種與多動症和自閉症患者相關的特徵，我對我在最新視頻中加入它所引起的冒犯感到非常抱歉。那一刻的背景，以及系列中羅曼和羅根之間的其他時刻，是我自己有時因爲在現實生活中做了完全相同的事情而對自己進行批評的比喻。我是相當有名的過度解釋，即使我的朋友說沒關係，我仍然發現自己爲此道歉。然而，我不知道這個詞對某些人來說是冒犯的，這是我需要學習的東西。不管怎麼說，我喜歡羅根的這種特質，我們在敘事上描寫羅曼說這句話是錯誤的。而且，羅根在未來也會因此得到平反。今後，我一定會對任何術語進行三查。再次，我非常抱歉）。)

衷心感謝我們的贊助人，他們的支持已經讓這樣的項目變得更加可能了 

如果您想給予支持併成爲我們的贊助人，您可以前往Patreon.com/ThomasSanders網站進行支持。

每個人都經過了適當的Covid測試，當他們不在鏡頭前時，他們都戴上了面具。在整個拍攝過程中，確保團隊規模非常小!
 
我想在此向AJ和Davi表示感謝，他們不僅幫助編寫了劇本，還在拍攝過程中作爲工作人員提供了幫助。

AJ的鏈接。
https://www.instagram.com/aj.hentges

戴維的鏈接。
https://www.instagram.com/hello_davii
https://www.twitter.com/hello_davi
https://vm.tiktok.com/ZMJAwTT8X/

此外，還要感謝我們出色的製片人Quil加入拍攝團隊，並幫助製作道具。

Quil的鏈接。
https://www.instagram.com/quildarling
https://www.twitter.com/quildarling
https://vm.tiktok.com/ZMJPjMe4W/

衷心感謝Mandy Celine的Ed Templer，感謝他幫助編輯了這段視頻的廣告片。

Ed的鏈接。
https://mandyceline.com
https://twitch.tv/gamehoggames

我也要感謝James，再次擔任我們的攝像師。他一如既往地給我們留下了深刻的印象！!

詹姆斯的鏈接。
https://www.youtube.com/c/jlite
https://www.instagram.com/jameslightner

非常感謝Brei在這段視頻中提供的所有動畫效果和特殊圖形！!

Brei的鏈接。
https://www.twitter.com/breigrace
https://www.instagram.com/brei.grace
https://breigrace.wixsite.com/portfolio

非常感謝Danilo的可愛縮略圖。

Danilo的鏈接。
https://www.youtube.com/CometBrace/

最後，我想非常感謝Aleksandr和Sterling作爲我們的滑板手出現在視頻中，以及Kenny作爲我們的Patton替身！！！！！！。

Aleksandr的鏈接。
https://www.twitter.com/aswilde1
https://www.instagram.com/wildfirecontent

肯尼的鏈接。
https://www.youtube.com/user/KAJAproduction
https://www.twitter.com/kennyguygames
http://www.Instagram.com/thatkennyguy1 
http://www.twitch.tv/thatkennyguygames

斯特林的鏈接。
https://www.instagram.com/sterling_shaped_sterling

_______________________

http://www.Twitter.com/ThomasSanders
http://www.Instagram.com/ThomasSanders
http://www.Facebook.com/ThomasSandersOfficial
